main event: Two witnesses reported observing a large red circular object hovering over Moultrie, Georgia, which seemed to grow larger as it approached.
interesting points: The object was spotted stationary east from Sale City toward Moultrie,The object appeared high in the sky and seemed to be at a great distance,Various lights were seen shining towards the object during the observation,The witnesses confirmed they both saw the same thing,The conclusion of the report identified the object as the Moon.
witness description: Witnesses reported seeing a large red circular object in the sky.
